00025 
00026 // calculates Overlaps and Observables
00027 
00028 void ProjectionSlave(void)
00029 {
00030   MPI_Status status;
00031 
00032   Interaction Int;
00033   int A;
00034   SlaterDet Q, Qp, Qpp;
00035   SlaterDetAux X;
00036 
00037   int task;
00038 
00039   BroadcastTask(&task);
00040   if (task != TASKSTART)
00041     return;
00042 
00043   BroadcastInteraction(&Int);
00044   BroadcastA(&A);
00045 
00046   allocateSlaterDet(&Q, A);
00047   allocateSlaterDet(&Qp, A);
00048   allocateSlaterDet(&Qpp, A);
00049   allocateSlaterDetAux(&X, A);
00050 
00051   while (1) {
00052 
00053     BroadcastTask(&task);
00054     if (task != TASKPROJECTOVLAPOD && 
00055         task != TASKPROJECTOBSERVABLESOD)
00056       return;
00057 
00058     double projpar[6];
00059     double *angle, *R;
00060 
00061     BroadcastSlaterDet(&Q);
00062     BroadcastSlaterDet(&Qp);
00063 
00064     while (1) {
00065 
00066       MPI_Recv(projpar, 6, MPI_DOUBLE, 0, TAGPROJECT6, MPI_COMM_WORLD, &status);
00067       if (projpar[0] < 0.0)
00068         break;
00069         
00070       angle = &projpar[0];
00071       R = &projpar[3];
00072 
00073       copySlaterDet(&Qp, &Qpp);
00074 
00075       moveSlaterDet(&Qpp, R);
00076       rotateSlaterDet(&Qpp, angle[0], angle[1], angle[2]);
00077 
00078       if (task == TASKPROJECTOVLAPOD) {
00079         complex double ovl[2];
00080 
00081         calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qpp, &X);
00082         ovl[0] = X.ovlap;
00083 
00084         invertSlaterDet(&Qpp);
00085 
00086         calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qpp, &X); 
00087         ovl[1] = X.ovlap;
00088 
00089         MPI_Send(ovl, 2*sizeof(complex double), MPI_BYTE, 
00090                  0, TAGMEOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00091       }
00092 
00093       if (task == TASKPROJECTOBSERVABLESOD) {
00094         Observablesod obs[2];
00095 
00096         calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qpp, &X); 
00097         calcObservablesod(&Int, &Q, &Qpp, &X, &obs[0]);
00098 
00099         invertSlaterDet(&Qpp);
00100 
00101         calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Q, &Qpp, &X); 
00102         calcObservablesod(&Int, &Q, &Qpp, &X, &obs[1]);
00103 
00104         MPI_Send(obs, 2*sizeof(Observablesod), MPI_BYTE, 
00105                  0, TAGMEOD, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00106       }
00107 
00108     }   
00109 
00110   }
00111 
00112 }
